scripts.get-hops: npm run build && mkdir -p ./work && node ./dist/firebase.js > ./work/blackholes.txt && cp work/blackholes.txt ../website/public/blackholes.txt
scripts.generate-code: npm run build && node dist/rollup.js < work/blackholes.txt > ../website/src/utility/generated.ts
scripts.all: npm run get-hops && npm run generate-code && echo "There are $(cat work/blackholes.txt | wc -l) hops."
